segment.source: > TO: PATAPHYSICS DEPARTMENT(ALL) > Ladies, > As many of you are aware, Pataphysics command has been working on an update on [[[sandrewswann-s-proposal|Dr.Swann's Narrative Sandwich model]]] to keep us up to date with Metanarrativics' recent research.
segment.target: > TO: PATAPHYSICS DEPARTMENT(ALL) > Ladies, > As many of you are aware, Pataphysics command has been working on an update on [[[sandrewswann-s-proposal|Dr.Swann's Narrative Sandwich model]]] to keep us up to date with Metanarrativics' recent research.

segment.source: The document has now been released, and can be found [[span style="color:#b01;"]]here[[/span]].
segment.target: The document has now been released, and can be found [[span style="color:#b01;"]]here[[/span]].

segment.source: > > The gist of this update is the incorporation of Doctor Huever's Hypercanon theory, which holds that our reality is not a single narrative bulk below the Alpha layer, but an n-dimensional set of narrative planes connecting at defined conceptual points.
segment.target: > > The gist of this update is the incorporation of Doctor Huever's Hypercanon theory, which holds that our reality is not a single narrative bulk below the Alpha layer, but an n-dimensional set of narrative planes connecting at defined conceptual points.

segment.source: The most notable concentration of these points is, of course, the Database.
segment.target: The most notable concentration of these points is, of course, the Database.

segment.source: While the formation of these narrative planes is still being studied, the strongest coherent factor between them is Database Causal Inclusions - that is to say, instances of swn001-1 ("//Horror Writer Entities//").
segment.target: While the formation of these narrative planes is still being studied, the strongest coherent factor between them is Database Causal Inclusions - that is to say, instances of swn001-1 ("//Horror Writer Entities//").

segment.source: > > Our very own [http://www.scp-wiki.net/forum/t-1938548/the-grand-crosslinking| Operation FLAT HORIZON] has shown some success thus far in incorporating these planes, thus reducing their multiplicity.
segment.target: > > Our very own [http://www.scp-wiki.net/forum/t-1938548/the-grand-crosslinking| Operation FLAT HORIZON] has shown some success thus far in incorporating these planes, thus reducing their multiplicity.

segment.source: Our grasp on the Alpha layer has greatly increased in the last month alone as such.
segment.target: Our grasp on the Alpha layer has greatly increased in the last month alone as such.

segment.source: Knowing this, I propose we move to stage two of **Operation ÓverMeta**.
segment.target: Knowing this, I propose we move to stage two of **Operation ÓverMeta**.

segment.source: With research into the mechanics of [[[SCP-1304]]] and observation of [[[scp-2916|SCP-2916-1]]] and [[[SCP-2747]]], subnarrative entities capable of acting on and escaping to their upper layer, Procedure Kuzco-Bueller has been developed by Subnarrativics, utilising [[[SCP-826]]], for the purpose of full narrative extraction - taking fictional entities and bringing them into our reality.
segment.target: With research into the mechanics of [[[SCP-1304]]] and observation of [[[scp-2916|SCP-2916-1]]] and [[[SCP-2747]]], subnarrative entities capable of acting on and escaping to their upper layer, Procedure Kuzco-Bueller has been developed by Subnarrativics, utilising [[[SCP-826]]], for the purpose of full narrative extraction - taking fictional entities and bringing them into our reality.

segment.source: We plan to create a task force of hypernarrative entities with this procedure, enlisting the aid of [[[scp-423|our standard scout]]] as a recruiter, with the purpose of creating a new narrative plane under our influence that intersects with other narrative planes.
segment.target: We plan to create a task force of hypernarrative entities with this procedure, enlisting the aid of [[[scp-423|our standard scout]]] as a recruiter, with the purpose of creating a new narrative plane under our influence that intersects with other narrative planes.

segment.source: Put into plain English: we're going to make a canon.
segment.target: Put into plain English: we're going to make a canon.

segment.source: > > Many of you may be wondering why I'm explaining so many concepts to you in this missive.
segment.target: > > Many of you may be wondering why I'm explaining so many concepts to you in this missive.

segment.source: After all, this is old hat to anyone who's worked here for more than a few months.
segment.target: After all, this is old hat to anyone who's worked here for more than a few months.

segment.source: Some of the cleverest among you may already suspect the answer.
segment.target: Some of the cleverest among you may already suspect the answer.

segment.source: Ladies, this letter is our canon's introduction.
segment.target: Ladies, this letter is our canon's introduction.

segment.target: Welcome to the adventures of MTF-ι-0 ("NN"), reader.

They're emotional memories for me, I'd prefer not to-"
